title: Fireside With The Underboss - This Could Destroy Cosa Nostra
description: The repercussions of the Castellano hit hang over the heads of Sammy and his crew. Toddo tells Sammy that this could destroy Cosa Nostra and that from here in out, he will always have a target on his back.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: The repercussions of the Castellano hit hang over the heads of Sammy and his crew. Toddo tells Sammy that this could destroy Cosa Nostra and that from here in out, he will always have a target on his back.
